properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 9 at 11:19PM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
At 1119 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near
Lamont, or near Rison, moving northeast at 50 mph.

Half inch hail and winds in excess of 40 mph will be possible with
this storm.

Locations impacted include...
Pine Bluff...                     Rison...
White Hall...                     Warbritton...
Cottondale...                     Lamont...
Linwood...                        Kedron...
Pine Bluff Arsenal...             Sulphur Springs...
Tarry...                          Tamo...
Pinebergen...                     Faith...
Moscow...                         Ladd...
Glenlake...                       Watson Chapel...
Staves...                         Mt Zion...
properties.instruction:
Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm, and may lead
to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded
roadways.

Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm.
Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe
shelter inside a building or vehicle.

NWSheadline: SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR NORTHEASTERN CLEVELAND... SOUTHEASTERN GRANT...SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON AND NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN COUNTIES UNTIL 1145 PM CST
